name: Cube Adventures 2: The Outbreak
description:
IT'S TIME FOR ANOTHER JOURNEY OF ANOTHER HERO! NOW ON IT'S SECOND BETA VERSION!

Join our little blue Cube on it's journey to solve the ongoing outbreak that nearly doomed every cube living. His mission is to protect all other living cubes from an unknown species that infects thousands of cubes. Let's Go Find The Cure to this problem.

Little Flashback: After the "Mighty Red Cube" defeated "Mighty Boo", an unknown species came to the "Cube Planet" and scattered everywhere to infect thousands of cubes. "Mighty Red Cube" died fighting this thing because no one can ever defeat such thing but "Mighty Red Cube". But it turned out to be stronger than they thought it would and now they are in-search of another hero. The unknown species made a deal that if they were defeated, they will stop their schemes to destroy and kill Cubes on Cube Planet.
